name: amazon-parser
description: Parse Amazon Product Information to populate Puzzlewood database

scripts.concat_: concat -o sql/script.sql sql/spec_body.sql sql/spec_header.sql sql/specs.sql sql/cat.sql sql/prod.sql sql/ass_prod_spec.sql sql/message.sql sql/q_a.sql sql/review.sql sql/lists.sql sql/wishlists.sql sql/carts.sql sql/ass_list_product.sql
scripts.load: yarn run load_ && yarn run concat_
scripts.full: yarn run start && yarn run load_ && yarn run concat_
